description: Grants permission to put a use case for model access.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Although not creating new users, it enables valid accounts to access models, which can be exploited for continued access.
This API call allows manipulation of permissions related to model access, which can be leveraged for privilege escalation or maintaining access.
